docs.snippet: Ray Emery had a major operation for a degenerative hip condition four years ago and said, “I want to make the most of it,” every time he took the ice....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ray Emery had a major operation for a degenerative hip condition four years ago and said, “I want to make the most of it,” every time he took the ice.
docs.abstract: Philadelphia Flyers backup goaltender Ray Emery, who underwent surgery for a degenerative hip condition in 2010, helps team forge a 4-2 playoff victory against New York Rangers; victory breaks nine-game losing streak for the Flyers at Madison Square Garden and is Emery's first playoff victory in three years.

headline.main: Flyers’ Backup Goalie Is Used to Facing Tough Battles
headline.print_headline: Flyers’ Backup Goalie Is Used to Facing Tough Challenges

docs.snippet: Ditto Labs will search photos on Instagram, Tumblr and Twitter for Kraft Macaroni and Cheese products and use that information to develop marketing strategies....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ditto Labs will search photos on Instagram, Tumblr and Twitter for Kraft Macaroni and Cheese products and use that information to develop marketing strategies.
docs.abstract: Advertising column; Kraft Foods Group's Kraft Macaroni and Cheese is expanding its social media outreach efforts with help from high-tech start-up Ditto Labs, which will analyze photos shared on Instagram, Tumblr and Twitter; plans to use that information to develop marketing strategies.

headline.main: Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Enlists Start-Up to Help With Social Media
headline.print_headline: Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Enlists Start-Up to Help With Social Media
